description: 这是一个人工智能实验，旨在使叙述更易于理解。描述一些元素，AI会实时将其转化为叙述。
create_unique_stories: 创建独特的故事：输入一个简短的描述，包括要在故事中包含的角色、背景、动作或其他创意。
produce_story: 生成故事：点击“生成故事”按钮，AI技术会根据描述生成独特且引人入胜的故事。
try_luck: 试试手气：如果不确定要写什么，可以点击“我感觉幸运！”按钮，将文本字段填充为随机选择的示例文本，然后用它来生成故事。
goal: 目标是持续开发并实现新功能，以提高用户体验。每个月都会选择一个新的慈善机构进行捐赠。请访问Github页面获取更新信息和贡献项目的机会。可以通过Vipps来支持进一步的开发：
this_month: 本月我们支持 Dr. Bayan，这个工具是通过技术创新为社区做贡献的一种尝试。目标是激发年轻人和年长者表达他们的创造力和好奇心。
help_bayan: 帮助叙利亚医生 Bayan 行医
consider_contribution: 到目前为止，已生成了故事。为了支持 StoryGen 的进一步开发，请考虑做出贡献：
title: 故事生成器
examples: Frog Miss jumps higher than anyone else in the forest, and every time she lands, she creates a miniature rainstorm with the splashes.
Mr. Rabbit has ears so long that they reach the clouds, and sometimes he has to bend down to avoid getting stuck in the stars.
Little Parrot is so colorful that a rainbow looks gray in comparison, and every time she flies, she leaves a trail of sparkling colors.
Sir Tortoise is so slow that it takes him a whole day to cross the road, but he always has time to stop and help someone in need.
Flamingo Miss has legs as thin as spaghetti, but she can balance on one leg longer than anyone else in the pond.
Mr. Elephant has a trunk so big that he can use it as a periscope and see over the trees even when lying on his stomach.
Panda Miss loves to climb so high that she can look directly into the sunset, and she turns trees into her own private playgrounds.
Sir Hedgehog is so small that he can hide in an acorn shell, but he has a friend in every corner of the forest.
Captain Dolphin loves to swim so fast that she creates waves big enough to surf on, and she always lets the music of the ocean guide her way.
storyGenDescription: StoryGen 允许用户为儿童生成个性化、引人入胜和富有创意的故事。
futurePlansDescription: 目标是持续开发并实现新功能，以提升用户体验。每个月都会选择一个新的慈善事业进行捐赠。访问GitHub页面获取更新信息和贡献项目的机会。
supportingCauseDescription: 本月，我们的贡献支持 Dr. Bayan，因为这个工具是通过技术创新为社会做贡献的尝试。目标是激发年轻人和年长者表达他们的创造力和好奇心。
supportingCauseText: 帮助叙利亚医生 Bayan 行医
supportDevelopmentText: 个故事。为了支持 StoryGen 的进一步开发，请考虑做出贡献。
